text: Hugo Vandermersch (born 5 May 1999) is a French professional footballer who plays as a rightback for the club SM Caen. ==Professional career== On 23 July 2019, Vandermersch signed his first professional contract with SM Caen. Vandermersch made his professional debut with Caen in a 1-1 Ligue 2 tie with Niort on 23 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * SM Caen Profile * LFP Profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pas-de-Calais Category:French footballers Category:Stade Malherbe Caen players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Hugo Vandermersch
